name: CCL Industries Inc. Unlimited Class A Voting Shares
longDescription: CCL Industries Inc manufactures and sells packaging and packaging-related products. The company operates through various segments, which include The CCL segment, which generates the majority of revenue, sells pressure sensitive and extruded film materials used for labels on consumer packaging, healthcare, automotive, and consumer durable products. The Avery segment sells software, labels, tags, dividers, badges, and specialty card products under the Avery brand. The Checkpoint segment includes the manufacturing and selling of technology-driven, inventory management and labeling solutions. Innovia segment manufactures specialty films. Its geographical segments include Canada; USA and Puerto Rico; Mexico, Brazil, Chile & Argentina; Europe; and Asia, Australia, Africa & New Zealand.

fullAddress: 111 Gordon Baker Road,Suite 801, Toronto, ON, CA
